For more information, see the `CONTRIBUTING` guide.

### Logs

Attach (as a file) `_logs/bcnode-exception.log` and last `_logs/bcnode-<TIMESTAMP>.log` (the
timestamped logs are rotated each hour, include the one from last hour).
